title: Add My Account page for customers to view orders

requirements.text: Create a new 'My Account' page route at /account that displays the authenticated customer's order history with order IDs, dates, statuses, and total amounts

quotes: CRAET A OPTION OF "MY ACCOUNT" FOR CUSTOMERS WHERE THEY CAN CHECK THEIR PRODUCTS ORDERED AND ORDER STATUS.

acceptanceCriteria: New route /account exists and is accessible to authenticated customers
Page displays a list of all orders for the logged-in customer
Each order shows order ID, order date, order status, and total amount
Orders are sorted by date (most recent first)

requirements.text: Add a 'My Account' navigation link in the header that is visible only to authenticated non-admin users
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation link labeled 'My Account' appears in the header Layout component
Link is only visible when user is authenticated
Link is hidden for admin users (admins have separate Orders section)
Clicking the link navigates to /account page

requirements.text: From the My Account page, allow customers to click on any order to navigate to the existing order details page to view full order information including products ordered

quotes: WHERE THEY CAN CHECK THEIR PRODUCTS ORDERED AND ORDER STATUS

acceptanceCriteria: Each order in the My Account list is clickable
Clicking an order navigates to /orders/:orderId using the existing OrderDetails page
The existing OrderDetails page displays complete order information including all products

requirements.text: Display a helpful message on the My Account page when the customer has no orders yet
acceptanceCriteria: Empty state message appears when customer has zero orders
Message encourages customer to browse products
Includes link or button to navigate back to the product catalog

constraints: Do not modify the existing OrderDetails page at frontend/src/pages/OrderDetails.tsx
Do not modify backend order retrieval logic in backend/main.mo
Maintain the existing blue-cyan gradient theme and Space Grotesk typography
Preserve the existing admin Orders page functionality
nonGoals: Adding order cancellation or modification features
Implementing order filtering or search functionality
Adding email notifications for order updates
Creating separate order status update mechanisms
